text: Samantha Reyes Marín (born 9 August 1992) is an Andorran retired footballer who played as a defender. She has been a member of the Andorra women's national team. ==International career== Reyes has been capped for the Andorra national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. She retired in June 2019, following a friendly match against Luxembourg. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Andorran women's footballers Category:Andorra women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders
title: Samantha Reyes
